fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design

Interface IFormContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPageContext

    public interface IFormContext
extends IPageContext
    Provides access to page processing context for form pages, including proxied access to relevant page processor methods.

    This interface is normally only required by implementations of IFormPage.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent read/write access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IFormPage.setPageContext(IFormContext)

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design.IPageContext

        beforeDataMerge, filterTemplateMerge, get

    • Method Detail

      • beforeDataStore

        IItem beforeDataStore(IItem item)
               throws ItemStoreException
        Optionally replaces or modifies the item or attributes about to stored.

        When this is not required, this method should return null.

        Parameters:
        item - the item that will be stored, unless modified by this method.
        Returns:
        the modified (or unchanged) item to store, or an alternative item implementation to store, or null if no changes are required.
        Throws:
        ItemStoreException - if a processing error occurs.
        Since:
        1.0

      • afterDataItemFetch

        IItem afterDataItemFetch(IItem item)
                  throws ItemFetchException
        Optionally replaces or modifies a fetched data item.

        When this is not required, this method should return null.

        Parameters:
        item - the item that was fetched.
        Returns:
        the modified (or unchanged) fetched item, or an alternative item, or null if no changes are required.
        Throws:
        ItemFetchException - if a processing error occurs.
        Since:
        1.0
